questions.question: What does 'modeling' refer to in the context of virtual reality (VR)?

answers.a: The process of coding VR software
answers.b: The creation of 3D virtual objects or environments
answers.c: The use of headsets for immersive experiences

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of environment modeling?

answers.a: Designing a futuristic spaceship for a sci-fi game
answers.b: Creating a detailed virtual replica of a historical artifact

questions.question: How does environment modeling differ from object modeling?

answers.a: Environment modeling focuses on individual objects, while object modeling creates entire spaces
answers.b: Object modeling involves small-scale objects, while environment modeling designs entire immersive spaces
answers.c: Both terms mean the same thing in VR
